personalInfo.name: John Doe
personalInfo.title: Flutter & Android Developer
personalInfo.subtitle: Cross-Platform Mobile Developer | Flutter Expert | Jetpack Compose Enthusiast
personalInfo.bio: Passionate mobile developer with 3+ years of experience in Flutter and Android development. I specialize in creating cross-platform applications using Flutter and native Android apps using Jetpack Compose. With a strong foundation in modern development practices, I focus on building maintainable, scalable, and user-friendly applications.

skills.name: Flutter
skills.description: Google's UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

skills.name: Dart
skills.description: A client-optimized programming language for apps on multiple platforms.

skills.name: Android Development
skills.description: Native Android app development using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.

skills.name: Jetpack Compose
skills.description: Android's modern toolkit for building native UI with declarative programming.

skills.name: Kotlin
skills.description: A cross-platform, statically typed programming language with type inference.

skills.name: Firebase
skills.description: Google's platform for building and running successful apps with powerful backend services.

projects.title: E-Commerce Mobile App
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile application built with Flutter and Firebase. The app includes user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, order management, payment integration, and real-time notifications. Features a modern UI with smooth animations and offline support for better user experience.
projects.shortDescription: Full-featured e-commerce app with Flutter & Firebase
challenges: Implementing complex state management across multiple screens
Optimizing performance for large product catalogs

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: A beautiful and intuitive weather application built with Flutter and OpenWeatherMap API. The app provides current weather conditions, 7-day forecasts, weather maps, and severe weather alerts. Features a clean, animated interface with location-based services and customizable widgets.
projects.shortDescription: Beautiful weather app with animations and forecasts
challenges: Designing responsive layouts for various screen sizes

projects.title: Task Manager Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive task management application built with Flutter and Hive for local storage. The app helps users organize their daily tasks, set priorities, track progress, and maintain productivity. Features include categories, reminders, statistics, and data export.
projects.shortDescription: Productivity app for task management and organization

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
experience.description: Leading Flutter development team in creating cross-platform mobile applications. Responsible for architecture decisions, code reviews, and mentoring junior developers. Successfully delivered 5+ production apps with 100K+ downloads.
responsibilities: Lead development of cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter
Architect scalable and maintainable code structures
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with product managers and designers on feature requirements
Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment
Optimize app performance and ensure high-quality user experience
achievements: Reduced app crash rate by 85% through comprehensive testing strategies
Improved development velocity by 40% by implementing reusable components
Successfully migrated legacy codebase to Flutter 3.0
Led team of 6 developers on mission-critical projects
Achieved 4.8+ app store ratings across all published applications

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Developed native Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. Worked on consumer-facing apps with focus on modern UI/UX and performance. Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment.
responsibilities: Develop native Android applications using Kotlin and Java
Implement modern UI patterns with Jetpack Compose
Integrate REST APIs and handle data persistence
Participate in Agile development processes and sprint planning
Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
achievements: Developed 3 successful Android apps with 50K+ downloads each
Migrated legacy Java codebase to Kotlin, reducing code by 30%
Implemented offline-first architecture improving user retention by 25%
Received "Developer of the Quarter" award for exceptional performance

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Comprehensive computer science program covering software engineering, algorithms, data structures, mobile development, and web technologies. Graduated Magna Cum Laude with focus on mobile application development.
responsibilities: Completed coursework in Data Structures and Algorithms
Studied Software Engineering principles and practices
Conducted research on cross-platform development frameworks
achievements: Graduated Magna Cum Laude with 3.8 GPA
Best Mobile App Award for final year project
President of Computer Science Student Association
Published research paper on Flutter performance optimization
